item.title: Ssl Disable Connect
item.description: Insert Lead paragraph here. Question $ curl https://... curl: (35) error:1425F102:SSL routines:ssl_choose_client_version:unsupported protocol $ python with_ssl_session.py [DEBUG] SSL connection error occurred ('[SSL: WRONG_SSL_VERSION] wrong ssl version (_ssl.c:727)') [DEBUG] SSL connection error occurred ('[Errno 0] Error') [WARNING] can't establish SSL connection Reason Fixed $ vim /etc/ssl/openssl.cnf disable protocol minimum version constraints [system_default_sect] # MinProtocol = TLSv1.2
